  • Classes in org.apache.fineract.portfolio.loanaccount.loanschedule.data used by org.apache.fineract.portfolio.loanaccount.api 
    Class and Description
    LoanScheduleData
    Immutable data object to represent aspects of a loan schedule such as: Totals information - the totals for each part of repayment schedule monitored. Repayment schedule - the principal due, outstanding balance and cost of loan items such as interest and charges (both fees and penalties)
  • Classes in org.apache.fineract.portfolio.loanaccount.loanschedule.data used by org.apache.fineract.portfolio.loanaccount.data

    LoanSchedulePeriodData
